data.title: Illinois State Fair Adds Another Grandstand Mega Country Artist
data.meta_description: Another major grandstand announcement just dropped from the Illinois State Fair.
data.text:
Another major grandstand announcement just dropped from the Illinois State Fair.

Country superstar KEITH URBAN will be performing at this year's Illinois State Fair on Friday, August 9th. Tickets for this mega show will go on sale Saturday (March 9) at 10 a.m. This is the first time Keith will be performing at the Illinois State Fair, and I can promise you he puts on one hell of a show.

RELATED: First Country Artist Coming to the Illinois State Fair

Previsolu announced grandstand performers include Motley Crue and Jordan Davis with more still to be announced. The Illinois State Fair will take place August 8 - August 18.

General Ticket Information

A reminder that admission is not included in tickets for the grandstand and beware of scammer they are out there. Only purchase tickets through ticketmaster.com and make sure you read all the details before purchasing the tickets.

This year it seems that the Illinois State Fair pulling out the star-studded lineup and I don't know about you, but am pretty excited to see who else they have booked for this year's grandstand lineup. Stay Tuned.
